alert__alert_msg: Due to COVID-19, there may be changes to when, where and how you vote in your upcoming elections. Check with your state election site for more information.
alert__alert_after_election: For official election results, go to your state election website.
banner__banner_text: An official website of the United States government
banner__guidance_gov_text: A %.gov% website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.
banner__guidance_https_text: A lock %lock_icon% or %https% means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
